title: The Bunnyhop, Episode 7: Riejanne Markus, Katie Archibald, and Lizzie Deignan
content:
Rebecca Charlton, Katie Colclough and Tilda Price chat World Championships, Paris-Roubaix, and the upcoming Women's Tour.

Don’t miss out on the latest CyclingTips updates.

Episode 7 of The Bunnyhop powered by Cannondale has landed with only a few days to go before the inaugural women’s Paris-Roubaix. The episode is presented by Rebecca Charlton with special guests Katie Colclough and Tilda Price.

The three chat the recent World Championships road race, with an exclusive on-site report from Velonews writer Sadhbh O’Shea. There is analysis ahead of the Women’s Tour, which will take place in the first week of October after being cancelled in 2020 and postponed earlier this year. Rebecca takes in the Scottish countryside with Olympic gold medallist Katie Archibald, while Riejanne Markus talks about her arachnophobia and her sweet tooth in “Something About Me.”

Editors' Picks
author: Abby Mickey
